text: You are going on this *huge* adventure with big stuff and whatnot, slaying monsters and taking loot, and and and...
And you aren't taking me with you?
We've been friends since childhood, we always went on adventures together, and now you leave me hanging?
Who will be there to protect you? You need protection... From me! You do know that right?
Okay, here's the deal. You are taking me with you and *maybe* I'll forgive you.
You are so not gonna regret this.

8.text: Okay Luana, I will endure your presence.
